alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 2:10PM CDT until June 18 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Northeastern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 210 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Brundidge, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ariton, Java, Chestnut Grove, Bells Crossroads, Skipperville, Echo, Dill, Frisco, Roberts Crossroads, Wilkinstown, Rocky Head, Arguta, Barefield Crossroads, Beamon, Roeton, Clowers Crossroads, Phillips Crossroads, Ward Bridge, Dykes Crossroads and Hwy 231 Pea River Bridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
